verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Inexcusable <S%G379><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> O 5599 INJ Man, 444 N-VSM Every One 3956 A-NSM Who 3588 T-NSM Judgest, 2919 V-PAP-NSM For 1722 PREP In 3739 R-DSN That In Which 1063 CONJ Thou Judgest 2919 V-PAI-2S The 3588 T-ASM Other, 2087 A-ASM Thyself 4572 F-2ASM Thou Condemnest : 2632 V-PAI-2S 3588 T-APN For The 1063 CONJ Same 846 P-APN Thou Doest 4238 V-PAI-2S Who 3588 T-NSM Judgest. 2919 V-PAP-NSM

We Know <S%G1492><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Such <S%G3588><s%> Things <S%G5108><s%> Do. <S%G4238><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kindness <S%G5544><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Forbearance <S%G463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> Despisest Thou <S%G2706><s%> Not Knowing <S%G50><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kindness <S%G5543><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Leads? <S%G71><s%>

But According <S%G2596><s%> To <S%G1161><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4643><s%> Hardness <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Impenitent <S%G279><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Treasurest Up <S%G2343><s%> To Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Wrath <S%G3709><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of Righteous Judgment <S%G1341><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> Will Render <S%G591><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G2041><s%> Works <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> To Those That <S%G3303><s%> ' With <S%G2596><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> In Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Incorruptibility <S%G861><s%> Are Seeking <S%G2212><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>

For <S%G3756><s%> There <S%G1063><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Respect Of Persons <S%G4382><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

for <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hearers <S%G202><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law Are <S%G3551><s%> Just <S%G1342><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doers <S%G4163><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Shall Be Justified <S%G1344><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G2919><s%> <S%G2919><s%> Shall Judge <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Secrets <S%G2927><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> My <S%G3588><s%> Glad <S%G2098><s%> Tidings <S%G3450><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And Art Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> That <S%G5037><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> A Guide <S%G3595><s%> Art Of <S%G1511><s%> The Blind <S%G5185><s%> A Light <S%G5457><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Darkness, <S%G4655><s%>

Thou <S%G3588><s%> Then That <S%G3767><s%> Teachest <S%G1321><s%> Another, <S%G2087><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Dost Thou Teach? <S%G1321><s%> Thou That <S%G3588><s%> Proclaimest <S%G2784><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Steal, <S%G2813><s%> Dost Thou Steal? <S%G2813><s%>

Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Profits <S%G5623><s%> If The <S%G1437><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Thou Doest; <S%G4238><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> A Transgressor <S%G3848><s%> Of Law <S%G3551><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1510><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4061><s%> Circumcision <S%G4675><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> Has Become. <S%G1096><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Requirements <S%G1345><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Keep <S%G5442><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> His <S%G3588><s%> <S%G203><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Shall Be Reckoned? <S%G3049><s%>
